text:
PeerGust | New York City, US & Istanbul, Turkey | Full-time (REMOTE OK)

PeerGust is a next-generation CDN that grows with your audience. More details on https://angel.co/peergust

We are looking for a top-notch senior Go and TypeScript/JavaScript developers to join us in our quest for making the web more distributed. You will have an opportunity to highly influence and make big changes to our growing startup.

You can apply here: https://angel.co/peergust/jobs
